Weekly Class Subscription

£20/week. Pause or cancel anytime. Each class is recorded for review.

In-person Class

Thursdays, 7–9 pm at Tremarchog Village Hall, St Nicholas, Goodwick, SA64 0LG.

Bright, welcoming, accessible. Mid-session break.

What to Expect

  • Relaxed, focused pace
  • Weekly recordings
  • Accessible movements; seated options

FAQs

What should I bring? Loose clothes, a drink, snack.

Experience required? No — suitable for all levels.
